description: A welcoming and original bistro-restaurant in the historic centre, where the stone walls are typical of the region’s architecture and an attractive outdoor area offers a few tables just in front of the entrance. The experienced owner-chef is at the helm in the kitchen, preparing beautifully presented, contemporary-style dishes which are full of flavour. The menu also features a selection of raw fish and seafood options.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace
